ayas.translation: In the name of Allah, the Beneficent, the Merciful.
When Allah's succour and the triumph cometh

ayas.arabic: وَرَأَيْتَ ٱلنَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِى دِينِ ٱللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
ayas.translation: And thou seest mankind entering the religion of Allah in troops,
ayas.transliteration: wara-aytan nāsa yadkhulūna fī dīnillāhi afwājā

ayas.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَٱسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ تَوَّابًۢا
ayas.translation: Then hymn the praises of thy Lord, and seek forgiveness of Him. Lo! He is ever ready to show mercy.
ayas.transliteration: fasabbiḥ biḥamdi rabbika wastaghfirh ۚ innahu kāna tawwābā
